sentences.en: Apparently, well known actors were at these filthy parties.
sentences.cn: 听说有些知名演员也参加了这些下流的聚会。

sentences.en: He looked around the filthy room in distaste.
sentences.cn: 他厌恶地环顾着这肮脏的房间。

sentences.en: He never washed, and always wore a filthy old jacket.
sentences.cn: 他总是穿着一件从来不洗的脏兮兮的旧夹克。

sentences.en: I was pushed into a filthy, stinking room.
sentences.cn: 我被推进一间又脏又臭的屋子里。

sentences.en: My own house feels as filthy and chaotic as a bus terminal.
sentences.cn: 我自家的房子感觉又脏又乱，活像公共汽车终点站。

sentences.en: Take your filthy paws off me!
sentences.cn: 把你的脏手从我身上拿开！

sentences.en: The best housing they could afford was crowded and filthy.
sentences.cn: 他们能住得起的最好的住所也非常拥挤、肮脏不堪。

sentences.en: The city's streets are filthy and choked with exhaust fumes.
sentences.cn: 那座城市的街道肮脏不堪，弥漫着令人窒息的废气。

sentences.en: The hotel was really filthy and I'm not exaggerating.
sentences.cn: 我不是夸张，这旅店真的很脏。

sentences.en: The house was filthy, with clothes and newspapers strewn everywhere.
sentences.cn: 屋子里很脏，衣服和报纸扔得到处都是。

sentences.en: The huts they lived in were sordid and filthy beyond belief.
sentences.cn: 他们住的小房真是异乎寻常地脏.

sentences.en: The play was full of filthy foul language.
sentences.cn: 这部戏充斥着猥亵粗俗的语言。

sentences.en: The whole river has been fouled up with filthy waste from factories.
sentences.cn: 整条河都被工厂的污秽废物污染了.

trans.tran_cn: 肮脏的，污秽的，卑劣的，淫秽的，气愤的，(天气)阴冷潮湿的，恶劣的
